education.title: Enrolled at Hangzhou Yungu High School
education.description: Began high school education with focus on technology and engineering innovation.

education.title: CTB National Conference High Distinction
education.description: Awarded for outstanding achievement in Technology and Engineering Innovation at the 2024-2025 China Thinks Big (CTB) Global Youth Research Innovation Forum.
education.details: Recognized by Co-Directors Andrew Chen and Mike Yan for exceptional project work.

education.title: 2050 Conference at Yunqi Town
education.description: Participated in the 2050 Conference, a global gathering for young innovators and tech enthusiasts at Yunqi Town, Hangzhou.
education.details: Engaged with industry leaders and explored cutting-edge technology trends and future innovations.

education.title: UTSC Summer School Program
education.description: Attended summer program at University of Toronto Scarborough (UTSC), focusing on advanced technology and innovation studies.
education.details: Completed intensive coursework and collaborative projects with international students.
